{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}
else if (absX >= 3609 && absX <= 3627 && absY >= 3532 && absY <= 3532)
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
how do i fix it???

item.title: Someone please help ive been searching for 1 hour please help!
item.dc:creator: @chadrocks13 chadrocks13
item.description:
@chadrocks13 wrote:

no its not becasue thats for wildy

what you do is

  1. Go into player.java

  2. Search for
    Code:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player

  1. Should see something along these lines
    Code:

     // initial x and y coordinates of the player
 heightLevel = 0;
 teleportToX = XXXX;
 teleportToY = YYYY;

With XXXX and YYYY being numbers

  1. Modify the XXXX to the new X coordinates and modify YYYY to the new Y Coordinates

  2. Save>Compile>Run and that should be it

Read full topic

item.source: Someone please help ive been searching for 1 hour please help!

item.title: Someone please help ive been searching for 1 hour please help!
item.dc:creator: @Happyman Happyman
item.description:
@Happyman wrote:

If your using some form of a server based off servers like Pimpscape or Cheezscape:

  1. Search for public void checkwildy() in client.java

2.Should see something like this:

public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

3.Add else if (absX >= XXX1 && absX <= XXX2 && absY >= YYY1 && absY <= YYY2) { inwildy2 = false; } in both voids

  1. On your server go to the place you want to be a safezone.
    Make an Imaginary Box around that area, get the coordinates of the four corners of the square

  2. Replace XXX1 with your lowest X coordinate
    Replace XXX2 with your highest X coordinate
    Replace YYY1 with your lowest Y coordinate
    Replace YYY2 with your highest X coordinate

If your not using a form of servers such as Pimpscape or Cheezscape Base then I’m not sure

Read full topic
